code: import create from"zustand";import{persist}from"zustand/middleware";var userStore=create(persist(function(set,get){return{current:null,setUser:function setUser(user){return set({current:user});},logout:function logout(){return set({current:null});},isAuth:function isAuth(){return get().current!==null;}};},{name:"user-storage"}));export default userStore;
